attributes.action: reject the proposal to remove 'unnecessary' swearing from post-watershed broadcasting on television and radio
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Swear words are a vital part of our beautiful language and if this issue was of real concern to the majority of the viewing public then ratings would reflect this. Freedom of speech is an important part of our culture and one of the reasons celebrated figures in entertainment from across the world embrace this nation so much
